metadata.title: CVE-2022-24576 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
GPAC 1.0.1 is affected by Use After Free through MP4Box.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-24576` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2build1
gpac-modules-base - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2build1
libgpac11 - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gpac package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.0+dfsg1-2build1').
